Description: "Top Chef personality and James Beard Award-winning chef Tom Colicchio uses only the finest ingredients to create dishes bursting with flavor. The menu features ingredients from small family farms, artisanal producers and day-boat fisherman, prepared to capture the true flavor and essence of each dish.And while steak is front-and-center, guests can also find specialties like fresh salmon, veal and lobster to pair with Craftsteak_s award-winning wine, bourbon and scotch list."
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Event Name: Hecho En Vegas Mexican Grill & Cantina
Description: What Happens En Vegas_Hecho en Vegas is the spot for Mexican Cuisine in the MGM Grand. Choose from over 100 tequilas while dining in the brightly colored cantina or kick back on the open patio for some excellent people watching. Hecho en Vegas is perfect for informal large group dinners like Bachelorette Parties and Birthday Celebrations.

Description: Mediterranean GrillGreek Sneek serves Greek and Mediterranean cuisine created by executive chef, William DeMarco, along with hand-crafted Greek cocktails, inspired by native spirits, in addition to Greek wines, beers and Ouzo selections. Greek Sneek is a Morton Group restaurant.
Repeat: Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Food InfatuationSumptuous and social dining with American cuisine by Chef William DeMarco, to pair with playfully handcrafted cocktails, wine or beer from expertly curated lists. Crush is a Morton Group restaurant.

Description: French PerfectionWhen only the best will do for dinner, visit Jo‰l Robuchon_s unparalleled French restaurant. This unforgettable Three Michelin Star restaurant caters to a sophisticated palate and was designed to resemble a luxurious Art Deco townhouse complete with a lush garden terrace and marble floors.Winner of Forbes Five Star, AAA Five Diamond and Wine Spectator_s Grand Award, Jo‰l Robuchon has redefined Vegas dining. Quiet and intimate, this experience promises to be one of the finest meals of your life.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: So DeliziosoFrom Sicily to Milan, FiAMMA features a sophisticated take on traditional Italian cuisine in an intimate setting filled with comfy leather seating and a roaring fireplace.Feast on hearty, fresh pastas handcrafted daily and pair them with an award-winning wine list with over 700 selections from all over the world. Italian for flame, FiAMMA_s intimate fireside lounge is the perfect setting to enjoy a cocktail before or after your meal.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Cheers and BeersRaise a toast to PUB 1842, Michael Mina_s innovative twist on classic pub fare. Named for the year Pilsner beer was invented, the pub features a menu of playful comfort food and a great selection of unique whiskeys, hand-crafted cocktails and more than 30 beers on tap with a focus on craft beer from around the country.Of course, no pub would be complete without an extensive burger list. So Chef Mina has created a variety of inventive selections, signature entrees, and a full BBQ menu.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Join us and other sports fan for great food, ice cold beer and an Unparalleled sports dining experience

Description: California DreamingOne of the most recognized names in the culinary world, Wolfgang Puck, reinvents American bar and grill food with approachable, California-inspired cuisine in a casual and lively setting. Puck_s Bar & Grill serves up his signature comfort food favorites like wood-fired pizzas, choice cuts from the grill and a small bites menu that_s as delicious as it is expansive. As in all his restaurants, Puck lends his personal touch to ensure this bar and grill has plenty of energy and a festive, welcoming vibe.

Description: Eating Big Easy StyleKick your dining experience up a notch and taste for yourself how Emeril Lagasse earned his reputation as the king of modern Creole cooking.Showcasing Louisiana_s classic comfort food with a modern twist, this acclaimed restaurant continually serves up the _new_ in New Orleans. Surrounded by an imaginative sea-inspired design, dive into flavorful market fresh fish and shellfish creations or savory steak and chicken dishes straight from the Big Easy.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Modern CantoneseAcclaimed worldwide for its modern approach to authentic Cantonese cuisine, Hakkasan's culinary program uses the finest seasonal ingredients and expert techniques to create timeless yet innovative signature dishes. At the heart of the restaurant are a team of highly skilled chefs. Accompanying the delectable menu is Hakkasan's expansive mixology program, carefully curated for guests to explore the vast selection of libations made to complement the diverse menu. Equally as exotic as the food is the ambiance. Hakkasan_s interior exudes a sultry Shanghai-Chinois chic, rich in texture and detail, and animated by a luxurious array of ambient sounds, scents and lighting.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: REAL INGREDIENTS TASTE BETTERWhen we put the words burgers, shakes and fries on the outside of our building it_s a commitment _ not only to you, but to ourselves to always strive to serve the absolute best.  How do we do it?  We start with the highest quality ingredients, including fresh never frozen 100% beef, thick-cut Applewood smoked bacon, real Wisconsin cheddar cheese, cage free chicken and premium ice cream and then hand craft them into goodness. We put so much love and passion into our craft, we are willing to put our signature on every plate that leaves our kitchen.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
